document_data.name: ''Transubstantiality across Potentialities''
document_data.author: Unknown
document_data.mainbody: '''''Transubstantiality across Potentialities''''' was a book that detailed how spells were cast during the time of ancient [[Netheril]].
document_data.Description: Even in extremely poor condition, this valuable book of arcane lore could fetch upwards of 750 [[gp]].
document_data.History: A single, nearly-ruined copy of the book was known to lay within the treasure vault of the [[Tomb of Diderius]], ''circa'' the 1480s [[DR]].{{ToD-time}} That copy was somehow linked to the [[ghost]] of [[Ilda]], one of [[Diderius]]' apprentices. If it was returned to its rightful place in the tomb's library, Ilda's spectral form would no longer be bound to [[Toril]].
